OK Cancel
Warning Please enable GPS !
Instructions Welcome ! In order to calibrate the compass, please go to the main (compass) screen and rotate your phone around the 3 possible axis. Once this is done, compass should be stable. Set your target destination using the round button on the main screen. Follow the arrow on the compass to reach you destination ! Got it !
